Uses of Package
ca.weblite.shared.components

  • Packages that use ca.weblite.shared.components 
    Package Description
    ca.weblite.shared.components
    This package contains foundation components that are used by views in CodeRAD.
    com.codename1.rad.ui.animations
    This package contains animations that are used in CodeRAD views.
    com.codename1.rad.ui.entityviews
    This package contains entity views - view components that are bound to an Entity value model.
    com.codename1.rad.ui.menus
    This class contains menu components that can be bound to Actions and Action lists.
  • Classes in ca.weblite.shared.components used by ca.weblite.shared.components 
    Class and Description
    CollapsibleHeaderContainer
    A pane that includes a title bar that will hide when scrolling down the page, and reveal when scrolling back up the page.
    CollapsibleHeaderContainer.CollapseMode 
    CollapsibleHeaderContainerBuilder 
    CollapsibleSideBarContainer
    A Pane that includes a side bar and main content, which the sidebar would "overlap".
    CollapsibleSideBarContainer.SideBarEvent 
    CollapsibleSideBarContainerBuilder 
    HelpButton.HelpButtonType
    Help button types.
    InternalFrame
    An internal frame, which is used inside the TabbedDocumentView
    OverflowContainer
    A container that can provide some "overflow" content when the user swipes left.
    OverflowContainer.OverflowGroup 
    PopupMenu
    A popup-menu with commands that the user can click on.
    SideTabs
    A Tabs component that displays the tab buttons on the left side.
    TabbedDocumentView.TabbedDocumentViewDelegate 
    TagEditor.OptionFactory 
  • Classes in ca.weblite.shared.components used by com.codename1.rad.ui.animations 
    Class and Description
    ComponentImage
    A utility wrapper that allows a Component to be used as an Image so that it can be set as the icon for a Label or button.
  • Classes in ca.weblite.shared.components used by com.codename1.rad.ui.entityviews 
    Class and Description
    CollapsibleHeaderContainer.ScrollableContainer 
  • Classes in ca.weblite.shared.components used by com.codename1.rad.ui.menus 
    Class and Description
    PopupMenu
    A popup-menu with commands that the user can click on.
